description: "Chanmian" means to linger (illness/emotion) or be sentimental.

examples.chinese: 这个感冒缠缠绵绵,啥时候才能好
examples.translation: This cold is lingering endlessly, when will it get better?

examples.chinese: 别缠缠绵绵粘上来甩都甩不掉
examples.translation: Don't be so clingy that I can't sake you off.

examples.chinese: 我在努力的维持这段缠缠绵绵的爱情
examples.translation: I am trying hard to maintain this deep, entangled love.

examples.chinese: 缠缠绵绵了5年,还是要拜拜了
examples.translation: After 5 years of entanglement, we still have to say goodbye.
